description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the NP ingress buffer error event count
within a window exceeds the configured threshold.

event.Summary: NP Ingress buffer error events threshold exceeded: $v1

description: This object gives the range of ports serviced by the
NP identified by brcdNPBufferErrorSlotId and brcdNPBufferDeviceId.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPBufferErrorDescription

description: Counter for NP Ingress buffer error events recorded within a
window.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPBufferErrorIngressCurrentEvents

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the NP egress buffer error event count
within a window exceeds the configured threshold.

event.Summary: NP egress buffer error events threshold exceeded: $v1

description: This object gives the range of ports serviced by the
NP identified by brcdNPBufferErrorSlotId and brcdNPBufferDeviceId.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPBufferErrorDescription

description: Counter for NP Egress buffer error events recorded within a
window.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPBufferErrorEgressCurrentEvents

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the NP CSRAM error event count
within a window exceeds the configured threshold.

event.Summary: NP CSRAM error events threshold exceeded: $v1

description: This object gives the range of ports serviced by the NP identified
by brcdNPCSRAMErrorSlotId and brcdNPCSRAMErrorDeviceId.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPCSRAMErrorDescription

description: Counter for NP CSRAM errors recorded within a configured window.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPCSRAMErrorCurrentEvents

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the NP LPM RAM error event count
within a window exceeds the configured threshold.

event.Summary: NP LPM RAM $v1 error events threshold exceeded: $v2

description: This object gives a string representing the LPM identified
by brcdNPLPMRAMErrorIndex.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPLPMRAMErrorName

description: This object gives the range of ports serviced by the NP identified
by brcdNPLPMRAMErrorSlotId and brcdNPLPMRAMErrorDeviceId.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPLPMRAMErrorDescription

description: Counter for the error events recorded within a configured window
in the LPM identified by brcdNPLPMRAMErrorIndex
brcdNPLPMRAMErrorSlotId and brcdNPLPMRAMErrorDeviceId.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPLPMRAMErrorCurrentEvents

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a memory
parity error occurs in a NP device.

event.Summary: Memory parity error $v2 on NP device: $v1

description: This object can be used by the notifications to represent the
range of ports serviced by the NP device.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPNotificationSupportDescription

description: This object can be used by the traps to represent type or
location of the error in the NP device.
variables.name: BROCADE-NP-TM-STATS-MIB::brcdNPNotificationSupportErrorType
